column4: "Matse nsɛm a ɔtsetse dɛm pii: Hom nyinara hom yɛ nkɔmbɔhundzifo."

column2: "Aso nsɛm huhuw yi bɔbɔ adze nye yi? Anaa ebɛnadze na ohur wo bo ma ibua?"
"Mo so mubotum akasa dɛ mbrɛ hom yɛ; Sɛ hom wɔ me gyinabew yi mu a
column3: Nkyɛ mubotum ahɔr nsɛm egu hom do
column4: Na mawosow me tsir wɔ hom do."

column3: nkyɛ medze m’ano bɛhyɛ hom dzen
column4: Na menam m’anofamfa awerɛkyekyer do ama hom awerɛhow aabotow."

column3: m’awerɛhow rommbotow: Na sɛ migyaa so mpo a

column4: afei dze ama maberɛ: Ɔwo ama me fɛkuw nyinara egu."

column2: "Ɔwo edze mpomponee ahyɛ me ma a odzi me dase: Na mo fɔn ayɛ kɛse na

column3: na ɔyɛ me enyienyi; Ɔatwɛr ne se egu mo do: Na ɔdze enyitanhwɛ hwɛ me."

column2: "Wɔahanhan hɔn anomu wɔ mo do; Wɔabobɔ m’asomu enyimguase mu: Wɔka hɔnho boa ano tsia me."
"Nyankopɔn dze me ahyɛ hɔn a wonnyim Nyame nsa
column3: Na ɔatow me akyen ndzebɔnyɛfo nsamu."

column6: na ɔabobɔ me posoposo: Ɔdze me esi hɔ so ayɛ no botae."

column4: na onngyaa; Ohue no bɔwema gu famu."

column2: "Ɔdwerew me dze dwerew paa dwerew do: Otutu ba mo do dɛ ɔbran katakyi."

column3: Na medze m’ambɛn ato huntuma mu."
Na owu nwinwin wɔ m’enyisoatsɛw do;"

column4: Na mma mma mo sufrɛ nnya ahomgyebea."

column5: Na nyia ɔka ma me wɔ mbrɛ ɔkrɔn."

column2: "Me mfɛfo si me atwetwe: Na Nyankopɔn na m’enyiwa porow nyinsuwa kyerɛ no;"

column3: nkyɛ obi atotɔ aserɛ wɔ Nyankopɔn enyim ama me
column4: Dɛ nyimpa ba totɔ serɛ wɔ ne nyɛnko enyim:"

column3: Mobɔkɔ kwan a merennsan memmba no."
